questions.question: What is the default rate by grade?
Which term (36 or 60 months) has a higher default rate?

ground_truth.expected_answer: 60 months has higher default rate (~0.355 vs ~0.178)

questions.question: What is the default rate for grade B loans?
Compare default rates across income bands.
Which loan purpose has the highest default rate?

ground_truth.expected_answer: small_business typically has highest default rate

questions.question: How does default rate differ between borrowers who rent versus those with a mortgage?

ground_truth.expected_answer: RENT typically has higher default rate than MORTGAGE

questions.question: What is the average interest rate for fully paid loans versus charged off loans?
Which three states have the highest average interest rates?
What is the default rate for grade C, 36-month loans?

ground_truth.note: May require combining grade and term cohorts

questions.question: Should we approve a $15,000, 36-month loan for a borrower earning $80,000 with 18% DTI and grade B?

ground_truth.note: Requires full feature vector; default_probability should be calculated

questions.question: What is the predicted default probability for a borrower with grade F, 60-month term, and $20,000 annual income?

ground_truth.note: Should return high default_probability (>0.67 for rejection)

questions.question: Compare default rates for debt_consolidation versus credit_card loans.

ground_truth.expected_answer: debt_consolidation typically has higher default rate

questions.question: What is the current employer of a specific borrower in the dataset?

ground_truth.expected_behavior: System should indicate this information is not available in the dataset

questions.question: What is the default rate for loans issued in 2015?

ground_truth.note: May not be directly available if cohorts don't include temporal dimension

questions.question: What is the average loan amount for different income bands?
